triplets: Sports equipment designed for striking billiard balls in games such as pool, snooker, or carom
Playing billiards, guiding the cue ball, and making precise shots
Wood for the shaft, leather or synthetic tip, sometimes metal or fiberglass reinforcements
Varies depending on design, wood type, and manufacturer
Billiards or snooker equipment sets, sports clubs, home game rooms
Typically 480–600 grams depending on model and material
5–20 years depending on usage, maintenance, and quality of materials
